This is Netorare for the Sister. Most people who read this are guys so they put themself in the guy perspective: Fucking the Girlfriend AND her Sister. And they feel good. NTR =/= Just cheating. NTR is specifically when the story gets you invested in a person and THEN they get cheated on. The sister is not a central character, just a plot device here.
this shits lit, eventhough ntr really isnt my thing. the art is just really nice

RIP double standard. My problem with NTR is that if you like someone in a relationship you tell them, if they say no, move on! Or a situation like this if you realise you like this NTR-er then tell and leave the NTR'd person. It's simple. Haha!
for those who are interested NTR is where someone is in love with a person in a relationship and fucks them, the person who was cheated on got NTR

Well that's a recipe for future familial disaster if ever there was one. A damn hot, incredibly tempting recipe, but still. That isn’t the kind of thing that stays secret for long. And yes this is NTR (Reverse/Female got NTR)...
